description: Microsoft Defender Antivirus detected malware (Trojan:PowerShell/PSAttackTool.A) on NUW-BEST-16, which poses a severe threat to the network. The malware was detected in the WindowsPowerShell folder and was executed by user testuser22.

Microsoft Defender Antivirus has detected malware or other potentially unwanted software. Severe threat detected: Tool:Win32/EICAR_Test_File with ID 17463. Detection origin: Local machine, Detection type: Concrete, Detection source: Real-Time Protection.
